name: Porsum Cavalry
description:
My first color adventure piece on Tezos.
Featuring playful tune by Fabian Winandi.

Porsum comes with toxic positivity and charges upfront. The kind of innocence we had as a child is being used by many grownups who explores new spaces.
Sure, we might lose more than we can afford, but that's the thrill of the game.
Just like when you choose to jump without knowing whether you can reach that platform or not. It's a chance, not math. And that is what makes it worthy.
